short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gravity Falls Wallpaper turn new tab to HD Gravity Falls background. Custom Gravity Falls wallpaper theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Each new tab displays a different Gravity Falls wallpaper.
2. Choose a random or favorite Gravity Falls background in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Google-powered search bar.
4. Direct links to your emails and social media profiles.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New Note feature to jot down your tasks.
7. Quick links to your most frequently visited sites.
8. Streamlined access to your bookmarks.
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for rapid access.
10. Instant access to Google applications.
11. Explore More Themes with ease.
12. Effortless sharing to social media platforms.
13. Quick download of wallpapers.
14. Fast access to games.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Gravity Falls new tab.
